Reviews.Content: Good Location.. But... I booked a triple sharing which comes with a double bed plus a single bed from 19/3 till 22/3. Very happy with the arrangement. The check in was fast HOWEVER* when we check there is only 2 set of toiletries and towel, we called the reception. He said will arrange to bring up, but until the day we checked out the hotel.. i still DID NOT receive anything from them.* our room was not clean and bed not done as well as toiletries not replenished for the 3 nite stay. only to find from the note ( hidden) if we want them to do the room, please inform them! * Reception not very helpful, we were locked out of the room, the censor of the lock was not fully charged, couldn't read the card.I doubt i will go back to this hotel, for my last 10 trip to HK for the past 1 year, this is the only hotel which disappointed me. Booked them becos it's easter, most hotel was fully booked.
Reviews.Author: hsterica

Reviews.Content: 鎶滅兢銇儹銈便兗銈枫儳銉炽仹锛ｏ及銈傞珮銇勶紒   showReview(20892921, 'full');
Reviews.Author: 33chan
